title: Day 475
content:
# Day 475

This fasting thing is no joke. Glad I'm putting myself through the challenge, but it is difficult. It's weird because one second I feel better than normal and then the next moment I'm feeling serious fatigue.

I added some salt to my water for the electrolytes which I do believe is helping. Also going to cut back on my running and exercise this week. Need to give my body a chance to adapt.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*_dGqcGeGntT1Ub2n3D1qiA.png)

Putting myself through these challenges to prove I can do something difficult is rewarding. Things we obtain easily we don't value enough.

I'm looking forward to breaking my fast with some watermelon. I can envision it now. I'm not even that big a fan of watermelon, but I know one needs to be careful when breaking a fast.

So üçâ  it is.

7/10/23

Conor Jay Chepenik
